page.title: 13Farming cont.
page.content: Diesel engined tractors both 2 and 4 wheel drive provide the power for ploughing, subsoiling, cultivating, drilling, harrowing, hauling and loading. The implements are mainly directly attatched and hydraulically operated by the river in his heated safety cab with radio entertainment and sometimes 2 way radio. Herbicides, fungisides, insectisides, and inorganic firtalizers are applied by tractor mounter machines usually over a spreading width of 40 feet. Hedges are mechanically trimmed to give the countryside a tidy appearance Cereals and Oil Seed Rape are harvested by self propelled Combine Harvesters and dried in oil fierd machines before storing.
